mil3.3.8:1.3_1: yattha manoviññāṇaṁ uppajjati, phassopi tattha uppajjati, vedanāpi tattha uppajjati, saññāpi tattha uppajjati, cetanāpi tattha uppajjati, vitakkopi tattha uppajjati, vicāropi tattha uppajjati,
mil3.3.8:3.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, dve meṇḍā yujjheyyuṁ, tesu yathā eko meṇḍo, evaṁ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mil3.3.8:3.3_0: Yathā dutiyo meṇḍo, evaṁ rūpaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mil3.3.8:3.4_0: Yathā tesaṁ sannipāto, evaṁ phasso daṭṭhabbo”ti.
mil3.3.8:4.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, dve pāṇī vajjeyyuṁ, tesu yathā eko pāṇi, evaṁ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mil3.3.8:4.3_0: Yathā dutiyo pāṇi, evaṁ rūpaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mil3.3.8:4.4_0: Yathā tesaṁ sannipāto, evaṁ phasso daṭṭhabbo”ti.
mil3.3.8:5.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, dve sammā vajjeyyuṁ, tesu yathā eko sammo, evaṁ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mil3.3.8:5.3_0: Yathā dutiyo sammo, evaṁ rūpaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
mil3.3.8:5.4_0: Yathā tesaṁ sannipāto, evaṁ phasso daṭṭhabbo”ti.
